description: Carry and protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7 in a case with versatile options to suit your on-the-go lifestyle. The rooCASE Ultra Slim Leather Case for Kindle Fire HD 7 is made from Vegan Synthetic leather and has a micro suede interior to protect your device. Open and close the front lid supports the auto sleep / wake feature for added conveience. Cover folds back converting into a horizontal stand in landscape display and type mode. With easy access to ports and controls, you can keep your Kindle Fire HD 7 inside this case whether you use it at home or work. Pesonalize your Kindel Fire HD 7 in 5 different color options - black, green, magenta, purple and red.
title: rooCASE Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" Case - ( 2012 Previous Generation) Origami PU Leather 10.1-Inch 10.1" Cover with Landscape, Portrait, Typing Stand, Stylus - BLACK (With Auto Wake / Sleep Cover)
